posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Downs, Armbruster & O'Brien with PB, Tolstoi or Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Sean BH
Looking to buy Minneapolis player Jerry Downs with Sovereign or Tolstoi back.

Also looking for Armbruster and O'Brien with any back.

I would also be interested in lower grade Broad Leaf or Carolina Brights for any Minneapolis player.

E-mail me at hanksta_3@yahoo.com with what you have and price/scans.

Thanks,
Sean
